programme.title: Bad Girls
programme.longDescription: Smash-hit 00s prison drama. For the female prisoners and their guards at HMP Larkhall, life lurches from one crisis to another. Watch the battle to survive in this secret world.
programme.description: Smash-hit 00s prison drama - watch the battle to survive at HMP Larkhall

titles.description: The inmates rehearse for a fashion show and a prisoner falls seriously ill in her cell.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: As the inmates rehearse for a fashion show and Helen is forced into an alliance with difficult inmate. When a smelly convict returns, she upsets everyone with her nasty habits.

titles.description: Monica is struggling to cope with being separated from her son, who has Down's syndrome.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Struggling to cope with being separated from her son Spencer, recent G- Wing arrival Monica Lindsay does all she can to find him a place in a residential home.

titles.description: Longtime junkie Zandra is elated to learn that she can marry her newly detoxed boyfriend.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Zandra is elated to learn that she can marry her newly detoxed boyfriend Robin while behind bars. Meanwhile, Nikki tells Shell about Rachel's relationship.

titles.description: Zandra makes a request but is she telling the truth?
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Zandra makes a request but is she telling the truth? As hard-bitten inmate Shell forces her to smuggle drugs into Larkhall, Rachel despairs.

titles.description: Helen begins her investigation into Rachel's suicide and the trail soon leads to Fenner.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Helen starts investigating what happened to Rachel, and the tension between Nikki and prison bully Shell boils over.

titles.description: Helen tames a notoriously difficult prisoner, unwittingly earning the admiration of Nikki.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Helen tames a notoriously difficult prisoner, unwittingly earning the admiration of Nikki. Meanwhile, Lorna risks everything by supplying a prisoner with drugs.

titles.description: Shell makes off with Zandra's stash, having discovered Lorna's sideline in drug smuggling.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Shell makes off with Zandra's stash of pills, having discovered Lorna's sideline in drug smuggling, but Shell only succeeds in making things a whole lot worse for herself.

titles.description: Shell devises a cunning plan to put Lorna in her place.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Monica thinks her fortunes have finally taken a turn for the better, but she's about to be dealt a devastating blow. Shell devises a cunning plan to put Lorna in her place.

titles.description: The newspapers get wind of the substance abuse problem on G Wing.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Taken in by Shell's apparent religious conversion, Lorna agrees to do the troublemaker one last favour, and the press get hold of a scandal on G Wing.

titles.description: Helen is tortured by a sense of unease as the day of her wedding to Sean approaches.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Helen is tortured by a sense of unease as the day of her wedding to Sean approaches. Monica is determined that she won't be subjected to life on the outside without her son.

titles.description: Governor Helen hasn't returned from vacation, and Senior Officer Jim Fenner is in charge.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: G Wing is in turmoil. Wing Governor Helen Stewart hasn't returned from vacation, and Senior Officer Jim Fenner is in charge.

titles.description: Using a mobile phone smuggled in by Josh, Shell continues to torment Marilyn.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Using a mobile phone smuggled into Larkhall by prison worker Josh, Shell continues to torment Marilyn. The disturbing anonymous telephone calls to the Fenner household alarm Jim.

titles.description: Jim has a bad feeling that he could well find himself behind bars.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: With his marriage on the rocks, his career on the line and now the police on his doorstep, Jim realises that he could well find himself behind bars.

titles.description: Denny Blood feels sad when her mother doesn't show up as planned on visitors' day.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Denny Blood has been feeling sad since her mother didn't show up as planned on visitors' day, so Yvonne tries to boost both her mood and her confidence.

titles.description: Life on G Wing is hectic with a batch of newcomers.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Life on G Wing gets hectic when a batch of newcomers arrive. "Mad" Tessa Spall strikes fear into the prison officers because of her reputation for extreme violence.

titles.description: Karen reprimands Senior Officer Sylvia for mixing up two prisoners.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Karen reprimands Senior Officer Sylvia for mixing up two prisoners. When talk turns to Sylvia's recent injury, Karen decides to put her on an exercise and health routine.

titles.description: Helen returns to Larkhall in a new Home Office position, much to the delight of Nikki.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Helen returns to Larkhall in a new Home Office position, much to the delight of Nikki Wade and the dismay of prison officers, Jim and Sylvia.

titles.description: Crystal finds herself torn between caring for Zandra and starting a new life with Josh.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Crystal's release is coming up at the end of the week and Josh looks forward to spending more time with her, but she feels conflicted.

titles.description: With Zandra in such pain, those around her feel awkward about showing their true emotions.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Zandra's pain makes those around her feel awkward about showing their true emotions. She's also finding it more and more difficult to express herself.

titles.description: After seeing Zandra's little boy, the two Julies decide they want to have a child.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: After seeing Zandra's little boy, the two Julies experience the desire to have a child. Since they are clearly determined women, they resolve to get what they want.

titles.description: New prisoner Renee is making enemies fast and creating a growing list of inmates.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Renee is making enemies fast and creating a growing list of inmates with murderous intentions. When tragedy strikes, the police have a plethora of suspects to interview.

titles.description: Jealousy and intrigue are in the air at Larkhall's G Wing.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Jealousy and intrigue are in the air at Larkhall's G Wing when news reaches Nikki of Helen and Dominic's date. Nikki's jealous temper flares up.

titles.contentInfo: S2, E13. Oh What a Night
titles.description: Sylvia hosts her 30th wedding anniversary party in the officers' club.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Sylvia hosts her 30th wedding anniversary party in the officers' club and all of the officers let their hair down.

titles.contentInfo: S3, E1. Back From The Brink
titles.description: Shell is locked in a cell with Fenner, which forces the officers to take drastic action.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Revenge-hungry Shell is locked in a cell with Fenner, which forces the officers, who are still recovering from Hollamby's party, to take drastic action.

titles.contentInfo: S3, E2. The Turn of the Screw
titles.description: After Shell's attack on Fenner, Hollamby becomes determined to make her suffer.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: After Shell's attack, Hollamby becomes determined to make her suffer, and transfers Shell to a psychiatric ward.

titles.contentInfo: S3, E3. The Chains of Freedom
titles.description: Shell returns to G Wing but is confined to her cell while Julie S. is out of prison.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Shell is confined to her cell while Julie S. is out of prison on a home-detention curfew, and Sylvie proposes a strike.

titles.description: Julie S. returns to Larkhall while Yvonne spends some time with male escorts.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Julie S. returns to Larkhall while Yvonne spends some time with male escorts recommended by Nikki. Meanwhile, Barbara receives a shock when she hears what she's been accused of.

titles.description: Denny's life hangs in the balance after a new arrival, Buki Lester, challenges her.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Denny's life hangs in the balance after a new arrival, Buki Lester, challenges her. Yvonne fights with Charlie in court, and Fenner returns to work to find Shell waiting for him.

titles.description: Tensions rise as Podger Pam arrives in G Wing.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Tensions rise as Podger Pam arrives in G Wing. Josh begins his stint as a trainee prison officer under the watchful eye of Di, who seems a little obsessed with him.

titles.description: A TV documentary crew invades Larkhall to make a series, creating havoc.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: A TV documentary crew invades Larkhall to make a series, creating havoc. Buki reveals the truth about her childhood, and Fenner sees an opportunity to get rid of Shell for good.

titles.description: Shell and Denny celebrate their freedom by bingeing on vodka and cocaine.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Shell and Denny celebrate by bingeing on vodka and cocaine. They also decide to settle some scores with Sylvia and Hollamby.

titles.description: Charlotte, a young aristocrat, is sentenced to a year in Larkhall for drug offences.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Charlotte, a young aristocrat, is sentenced to a year in Larkhall for drug offences. Not fond of her attitude, the other inmates soon begin to terrorise her.

titles.description: Crystal goes on a hunger strike to protest her incorrect drug test results.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: When Crystal goes on a hunger strike to protest her incorrect drug test results, new inmate Charlotte is the one who supports her.

titles.description: When a prisoner, Femi, is bullied by the officers, Nikki organises a sit-in to help.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: When a Nigerian prisoner, Femi, is bullied by the officers, Nikki organises a sit-in to help, then the Peckham Boot Gang become involved...

titles.description: Nikki is grateful for the support from an attractive new prisoner.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Nikki is currently very unpopular, so she is grateful for the support from an attractive new prisoner, Caroline ... that is, until Maxi discovers some surprises in Caroline's past.

titles.description: Brothel madam Virginia O'Kane is sentenced to Larkhall.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Brothel madam Virginia is sentenced to Larkhall, where she surprises two of her former employees. Virginia is stuck in a wheelchair, and G Wing is ill-equipped to deal with her.

titles.description: Helen and Yvonne attempt to prove that Fenner is unfit to work with women prisoners.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: After hearing that Fenner and Virginia reached an agreement that could make him very rich, Helen and Yvonne attempt to prove that Fenner is unfit to work with women prisoners.

titles.description: Tina develops an unlikely friendship with Virginia, causing problems with Maxi and Al.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: After a deal is exposed, Fenner fights back using Barbara's diary. Meanwhile, Tina develops an unlikely friendship with Virginia, causing problems with Maxi and Al.

titles.description: Nikki's appeal gives Fenner the perfect opportunity to set his plans in motion.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: As Fenner's efforts to discredit Helen heat up, Nikki's appeal gives him the more opportunity to set his plans in motion. The Peckham Boot Gang seem to mend fences with Virginia.

titles.description: When Yvonne is accused of murder she takes drastic measures to avoid being charged.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: When Yvonne is accused of murder, she takes drastic measures to avoid being charged, and Shell and Denny try to avoid arrest in Spain.

titles.description: A new governor, Neil Grayling, arrives at Larkhall.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: A new governor, Neil Grayling, arrives at Larkhall determined to make his mark. Meanwhile, Di meets a new prison officer but finds out he is not a very nice person.

titles.description: Fenner is governor once again, but is horrified to learn something about Yvonne.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Fenner is governor once again, but is horrified to learn something about Yvonne which forces him into a tentative alliance with her.

titles.description: Denny arrives back on G Wing with two new inmates.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Denny arrives back on G Wing with two new inmates, Cassie Tyler and Roisin Connor, but Denny wants nothing to do with Shaz, who must contend with her old nemesis Bodybag.

titles.description: Neil's unpopularity increases because of his apparent personal vendetta against Karen.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Neil's unpopularity increases because of his apparent personal vendetta against Karen. Yvonne and Maxi come to blows when Virginia's killer is revealed.

titles.description: Julie J. becomes distraught when she finds her daughter in G Wing.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Julie J. becomes distraught when she finds her daughter in G Wing, and the truth about Rhiannon's boyfriend leads to a big mistake by the Julies.

titles.description: Fenner finally realises that his boss, has an interest in him beyond their occupation.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Fenner finally realises that Neil, his boss, has an interest in him that extends beyond their occupation. Shaz and Denny begin to push Buki too far, and Karen and Mark grow closer.

titles.description: Unable to cope with continual harassment, Buki harms herself.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Unable to cope with continual harassment, Buki harms herself. Roisin begins taking drugs to block out the suffering of being a prisoner.

titles.description: When Yvonne and Maxi come to blows, the consequences are dramatic.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: When Yvonne and Maxi come to blows, the consequences are dramatic. Crystal gives birth, and Buki reveals the reasons for wanting to be part of the prison's Mothers and Babies Unit.

titles.description: Karen struggles to cope after an assault, but involving the police would be futile.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: After being assaulted, Karen struggles to cope, but she realises that involving the police would be futile. Crystal makes a desperate bid to get her baby away from prison.

titles.description: Neil is in dire need of a new governor but Karen turns down the job.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Neil is in dire need of a new governor but Karen turns down the job which means that only Hollamby is left. Shaz and Al plan to fight but Maxi wants a piece of Shaz.

titles.description: An inspection team visits the prison, and Cassie and Roisin's relationship deteriorates.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: An inspection team visits the prison, and Cassie and Roisin's relationship deteriorates further. Yvonne is delighted to have her estranged son visit her.

titles.description: A vacant cell in G Wing is immediately filled by a mysterious American blonde.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: A vacant cell in G Wing is immediately filled by a mysterious American blonde who catches Fenner's eye. Then Yvonne realises she recognises her.

titles.description: Rhiannon attempts to make amends with her mother and aunt.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Rhiannon attempts to make amends with her mother and aunt when they are sentenced to eight years. Although Denny's mother is found, Denny finds that her excitement is short lived.

titles.description: Yvonne and Fenner are concerned about Karen's new relationship.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Yvonne and Fenner are concerned about Karen's new relationship for different reasons. Newcomer Snowball continues to manipulate the inmates in G Wing and makes plans to escape.

titles.description: G Wing holds an open day, and everyone is shocked when Snowball's plan reaches fruition.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: G Wing holds an open day, and everyone is shocked when Snowball's plan reaches fruition. Yvonne spends her day with a visiting male escort.

titles.description: Fenner joins some of his fellow prison officers on a weekend in Amsterdam.
titles.guidance: With flashing images, strong language, violence and adult scenes
titles.longDescription: Fenner joins some of his fellow prison officers on a weekend in Amsterdam. They're all interested in an erotic dancer until they realise that her face is uncomfortably familiar.

titles.description: Fenner has plans for Shell, and Snowball starts to put another scheme into action.
titles.guidance: With flashing images, strong language, nudity, violence and adult scenes
titles.longDescription: Shell, with Denny's help, plans to implicate Snowball for a death. Meanwhile, Fenner has his own plans for Shell and Snowball starts to put another scheme into action.

titles.description: The Costa Cons, Phyl and Bev, arrive at Larkhall with a suitcase full of gin.
titles.guidance: Contains flashing images with adult themes.
titles.longDescription: The Costa Cons, Phyl and Bev, arrive at Larkhall with a suitcase full of gin bottles, but Shell is the only one who isn't convinced they're as naïve as they appear.

titles.description: Shell goes into labor and gives birth to a baby boy.
titles.guidance: With flashing images, violence, strong language and adult scenes
titles.longDescription: When Colin advises Shell to carry on "business as usual," she threatens to reveal the truth about Fenner - but this backfires badly for her.

titles.description: Yvonne starts working on uncovering the truth about Shell.
titles.guidance: With flashing images, strong language, violence, drugs and adult scenes
titles.longDescription: Yvonne starts working on uncovering the truth about Shell. Meanwhile, Di finds life with Neil increasingly frustrating as he starts using their marital home for his exploits.

titles.description: One of Phyl and Bev's many business ventures comes to light.
titles.guidance: With strong language, themes of drug use and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: One of Phyl and Bev's many business ventures comes to light when Colin makes a discovery, but lucky for them, he's unlikely to turn them in.

titles.description: The presence of the media at Larkhall gives the women a perfect opportunity to protest.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, themes of drug abuse and suicide, and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: The presence of the media and a celebrity guest at Larkhall give the women a perfect opportunity to make a very public protest.

titles.description: When Julie S. finds a lump on her breast, she worries that it could be cancer.
titles.guidance: With strong language, adult themes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Colin escorts Yvonne to a funeral and is placed in a very difficult position when Fenner gets up to his old tricks on their return.

titles.description: Colin finally tells Karen the truth about the drugs on Yvonne.
titles.guidance: With strong language, adult themes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Colin finally tells Karen the truth about Yvonne. Meanwhile, Julie S. struggles with the reality of her health and the procedures she must face.

titles.description: Karen persuades Neil to take Snowball out of solitary confinement.
titles.guidance: With strong language, adult themes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Karen persuades Neil to take Snowball out of solitary confinement, hoping it will lift her spirits. Yvonne then gets roped in to protect Snowball.

titles.description: Fenner gets into serious trouble when allegations are made against him.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references, drug use and suicide scenes.
titles.longDescription: Fenner gets into serious trouble when allegations are made against him, and Karen and Helen Stewart also accuse him of wrongdoing.

titles.description: A familiar face is welcomed back to Larkhall as old-timer Noreen Biggs arrives on G Wing.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: A familiar face is welcomed back to Larkhall as old-timer Noreen Biggs arrives on G Wing. Unfortunately, she won't be enjoying her time for long.

titles.description: Fenner does the unthinkable and goes out to discover what evidence Karen has against him.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: When Fenner does the unthinkable and goes out to discover what evidence Karen has against him, he doesn't like what he finds and decides to take revenge.

titles.description: Kris Yates, a new inmate who has been sentenced to life, arrives at Larkhall.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Kris Yates, a new inmate who has been sentenced to life, arrives at Larkhall. She makes a big impression on new officer Selena Geeson, who requests Kris as her personal officer.

titles.description: Kris talks to Yvonne about an escape plan, but Yvonne doesn't want any part of it.
titles.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
titles.longDescription: Kris talks to Yvonne about an escape plan, but Yvonne doesn't want any part of it, and Denny's art exhibition experiences a setback.

titles.description: Buki looks forward to her release. Denny is transferred to an open prison.
titles.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
titles.longDescription: Henry's brother objects to a planned wedding and departs. Meanwhile, Buki looks forward to her release, and Yvonne decides to give Kris's plan a try.

titles.description: Two new inmates arrive with secrets, one of which is deadlier than the other.
titles.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
titles.longDescription: Two new inmates arrive with secrets - one of which is deadlier than the other. Selena secretly assists Kris so she can follow Yvonne's route out of the prison.

titles.description: The new governor, Frances, decides to make her presence known to the women of G Wing.
titles.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language and scenes of attempted suicide.
titles.longDescription: The new governor, Frances Myers, decides to make her presence known to the women of G Wing, who all knew her as inmate Frances Allen.

titles.description: Fenner is riddled with guilt over Yvonne and convinced her daughter is out for revenge.
titles.guidance: With scenes of violence, strong and offensive language.
titles.longDescription: Fenner is riddled with guilt over Yvonne and convinced her daughter is out for revenge, but the real danger might be closer than he thinks...

titles.description: A Muslim woman maintains that she is innocent of her crimes and protests.
titles.guidance: With violence, racial themes and adult scenes.
titles.longDescription: Convicted of murdering a relative, a Muslim woman maintains that she is innocent and climbs up on the roof of G Wing to continue her protest.

titles.description: The unrepentant Natalie Buxton returns and proves to be an unpopular prisoner.
titles.guidance: With violence and adult scenes.
titles.longDescription: The unrepentant Natalie Buxton returns and proves to be an unpopular prisoner. Having been convicted of child prostitution, she has a lot to prove if she is going to survive.

titles.description: Tanya Tucker arrives at the prison in a sweatbox for possession of Class A drugs.
titles.guidance: With violence, adult scenes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Tanya Tucker, a glamorous footballer's wife, arrives at the prison for possession of Class A drugs. With a tough time ahead of her, she goes on a mission to help a friend.

titles.description: As Fenner returns to G Wing, everyone fears that they'll be poisoned again.
titles.guidance: With adult scenes.
titles.longDescription: As Fenner returns to G Wing, everyone fears that they'll be poisoned again. The women become desperate to find out who is responsible - and the new arrival is the top suspect.

titles.description: Frances gets into deep trouble when she is suddenly thrown into an illegal plan.
titles.guidance: With violence and adult scenes.
titles.longDescription: Frances gets into deep trouble when she is suddenly thrown into a violent and illegal plan from the outside. Colin leaves to clear his head, but only Julie S. knows why.

titles.description: Julie S undergoes another medical scan and receives good news.
titles.guidance: Contains adult themes and some language that some viewers may find offensive.
titles.longDescription: Upset that Colin is gone, Julie J. hears about why he left from Julie S., who undergoes another medical scan and receives good news.

titles.description: Neil remains calm and determined to find former Wing Governor Karen Betts.
titles.guidance: Contains flashing images with adult themes and very strong offensive language.
titles.longDescription: Although his career is in serious jeopardy, Neil remains calm and determined to find former Wing Governor Karen Betts, believing she holds information that could bring down Fenner.

titles.description: Selena is in deep trouble, and Frances realises that she and Kris used to live together.
titles.guidance: Contains flashing images with violence, adult themes and mild language.
titles.longDescription: Selena is in deep trouble, and Frances realizes that she and Kris used to live together. Neil and Karen close in on Fenner, who was filmed running from an accident.

titles.description: Believing she is pregnant, Tina asks Phyl and Bev to talk to the spirits.
titles.guidance: Contains flashing images with adult themes mild language.
titles.longDescription: Jim is very happy that he and Di are going to get married, but when he sees Neil and Karen entering the church clutching a big envelope, he goes cold with panic.

titles.description: Fenner has a difficult time adjusting to life on the other side of the bars.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Fenner has a difficult time adjusting to life on the other side of the bars when some fellow inmates start harassing the former prison officer.

titles.description: Dr. Nicholson overhears Hollamby receiving some surprising and fortunate news.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: Dr. Nicholson overhears Hollamby receiving some surprising and fortunate news. Not surprisingly, the greedy doctor suddenly finds her irresistible. Meanwhile, Fenner is released from prison and finds his way directly into Di's waiting arms.

titles.description: In charge on G-Wing, Natalie seems to have everyone in her debt.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: In charge on G-Wing, Natalie seems to have everyone in her debt. She even has a cushy job working in the library, which serves as the perfect place to set a trap for Arun.

titles.description: A swarm of press arrives outside the gates of Larkhall.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references, hard drug use & scenes of suicide.
titles.longDescription: A swarm of press arrives outside Larkhall awaiting the arrival of Laura Canning, who has been convicted of stabbing her mother to death but seems incapable of such brutality.

titles.description: An elderly nun, Sister Thomas-Moore, arrives at Larkhall for a six-month sentence.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: An elderly nun, Sister Thomas-Moore, arrives at Larkhall for a six-month sentence for embezzlement. Since she hates nuns, Natalie takes it upon herself to make sure the Sister's stay is unpleasant. Meanwhile, Arun has a secret.

titles.description: New inmate Pat Kerrigan is transferred to Larkhall from another prison.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: New inmate Pat Kerrigan is transferred to Larkhall from another prison and immediately makes an impact by holding Sister Thomas at knifepoint in retaliation for abuse that Pat suffered as a child at the hands of the nun.

titles.description: The thought of being transferred to a men's prison makes Arun suicidal.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
titles.longDescription: The thought of being transferred to a men's prison makes Arun suicidal. Pat steps in to defend Arun after Natalie's harsh words drive her to despair.

titles.description: Fenner cannot believe it when Di acquires baby Dylan from one of the inmates.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
titles.longDescription: Fenner cannot believe it when Di acquires baby Dylan from one of the inmates. Disgusted by the return of Pat, who has overtaken G-Wing, Natalie resumes her escape plans.

titles.description: Bev rescues Phyl from being assaulted by a lowlife deliveryman.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
titles.longDescription: When Bev rescues Phyl from being assaulted by a lowlife deliveryman, the daring act proves fortunate, as it gives the pair a chance for freedom.

titles.description: Neil is suspended as acting governor pending an investigation.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
titles.longDescription: Fenner has no idea that most of Larkhall wants to make him pay for Yvonne. Meanwhile, Neil is suspended as acting governor pending an investigation into an escape.

titles.description: News about Jim Fenner means euphoria prevails in Larkhall.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, mild language and adult themes
titles.longDescription: News about Jim Fenner means euphoria prevails in Larkhall. Joy Masterson, the new, ex-army, no-nonsense governor arrives as Neil gets demoted to governor of G-Wing only.

titles.description: Di is accused of the murder of Fenner and finds herself on the wrong side of the bars.
titles.guidance: with mild language, sexual scenes and violence
titles.longDescription: Di is accused of the murder of Fenner and finds herself on the wrong side of the bars at Larkhall after Neil pulls some strings to get her sent to G-Wing. Natalie attempts to make her escape while out visiting her so-called brother.

titles.description: It's Christmas on G-Wing. As newcomer Miranda Miles arrives, Julie J. returns to Larkhall.
titles.guidance: CONTAINS VIOLENCE, MILD LANGUAGE AND ADULT SCENES
titles.longDescription: It's Christmas Eve on G-Wing. As newcomer Miranda Miles arrives, Julie J. returns to Larkhall, still seeing ghosts of Fenner.

titles.description: A new deputy governor, Lou Stoke, doesn't make the best impression on her first day.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: A new deputy governor, Lou Stoke, doesn't make the best impression on her first day at Larkhall. Meanwhile, new inmate Emira, the wife of a supposed terrorist bomber, arrives.

titles.description: Donny and Lou accompany Janine to her mother's funeral, unaware she's been blackmailed.
titles.guidance: CONTAINS VIOLENCE AND ADULT SCENES
titles.longDescription: Donny and Lou accompany Janine to her mother's funeral, unaware that Janine has been blackmailed by Natalie and must bring back something.

titles.description: Lou starts suspecting that something is wrong with the new inmate.
titles.guidance: Contains strong language, violence, sex references and hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: New arrival Angela Robbins has been convicted of arson and attempted murder, but she doesn't seem capable of the crimes, and Lou suspects that something is wrong.

titles.description: Although Donny shows concern for Janine, she shuns him because he betrayed Emira.
titles.guidance: With adult themes, violence, mild language and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Although Donny shows concern for Janine, she shuns him because he betrayed Emira. A new inmate, Stella Gough, delights Joy by expressing her desire to join the army.

titles.description: Joy wants Stella transferred, and Julie S. is happy to get a visit from David.
titles.guidance: With distressing scenes, violence, adult themes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Joy wants Stella transferred to another prison, and Julie S. is happy to get a visit from David, but it turns bittersweet.

titles.description: Vicky is still bitter toward Lou despite being cared for by her.
titles.guidance: With violence, adult themes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Vicky is still bitter toward Lou despite being cared for by her, and Julie S can't wait to meet her son's bride-to- be, Fidelity.

titles.description: Natalie's supposed escape from Larkhall makes the national news.
titles.guidance: With adult themes and flashing images.
titles.longDescription: Natalie's supposed escape from Larkhall makes the national news, while Tina's day in court causes her to panic.

titles.description: Tina is plagued with guilt when she returns to Larkhall.
titles.guidance: With distressing scenes and adult themes.
titles.longDescription: Tina is plagued with guilt and things only get worse. Rowan denies that he is still with his wife, but Lou is skeptical.

titles.description: After a near-death experience, Vicky reveals to Lou the truth about Rowan.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & hard drug use.
titles.longDescription: After a near-death experience, Vicky reveals to Lou the truth about Rowan, and Janine and Donny have a tumultuous day visiting her mother's grave.

titles.description: Famous entrepreneur and new inmate Catherine Earlham causes a stir upon arriving.
titles.guidance: With strong language, violence, sex references & suicide.
titles.longDescription: Famous entrepreneur and new inmate, Catherine Earlham causes a stir upon arriving at Larkhall. Joy enlists the newcomer for a prison inspection, and Janine makes a shocking discovery.

titles.description: A tough Christmas Eve for Hollamby on G-Wing results in a dreamlike vision.
titles.guidance: With strong and offensive language and disturbing images.
titles.longDescription: A tough Christmas Eve for Hollamby results in a dreamlike vision that changes her attitude. Meanwhile, Julie S. has a frightful visit to the Larkhall drainage system.
